word: What is the condition of those who keep the commandments of God and have the faith of Jesus? If in families there are those who are refusing obedience to the Lord in keeping His Sabbath, then the seal cannot be placed upon them. The sealing is a pledge from God of perfect security to His chosen ones. Sealing indicates you are God\92s chosen. He has appropriated you to Himself. As the sealed of God we are Christ\92s purchased possession, and no one shall pluck us out of His hands.\97Manuscript 59, 1895 (Manuscript Releases, vol. 15, pp. 223-225).
